resources.string: It seems that you are not connected to the Internet. Kindly check your network settings.
It seems that your location service is not enabled. Do you want to enable it to enjoy some feature of app?
GPS coordinates did not match with your current location.
App is unable to get your location, Please turn on your GPS.
There\'s no network connection right now. Please check your wifi connection or mobile data.
Problem retrieving data from servers due to connectivity issue.
There\'s no permission in offline mode, Please stable network connection right now or contact to admin for work in offline mode.

string-array.name: hse_survey
string-array.item: 3kg CO. fire extinguisher with valid expiry is available for electrical room/ Diesel Generator Set.
50kg DCP trolley with valid expiry is properly placed in tank area.
6kg DCP fire extinguisher with valid expiry is available and properly pressurized.
Earthing is properly done to all necessary equipments.
All wiring is properly covered and there are no loose or open wires.
Gas leakage detection system at CNG section is available and working.
The following signs are clearly visible and properly placed at island or canopy columns, No smoking, Switch- Off Engine, Switch-off mobile.
Compressors duly covered with protective guards.
Bonding cable is properly intact and working.
Sufficient sand buckets are available filled with clean and dry sand.
Toilets are clean and properly maintained.
The Shop Stop DOES NOT sell any explosive items like lighters, match box.
The CNG compressor room is free of any hazardous or unnecessary materials.

string-array.name: for_court_survey
string-array.item: Forecourt area is clean in all aspects.
All the dispensing units are functioning properly.
All signage and lighting are in proper order.
Lubricants are available and properly displayed on clean lubricant racks.
Meter reading is shown to the customers before and after fuel dispensing.
Wind screen cleaning service is provided to the customers at all times.
Only PSO lubricant is sold and changed at the station.
All the fuel prices on the dispensing units and price signage on monolith are updated and clearly visible to the customers.
Dust bins are available and in proper condition.
All the attendants and staff members are in clean and proper uniform.
Slogans wall is in presentable condition.
Clean drinking water is avaialble at the outlet.
Copy of explosive license or valid copy of paid challan is available and displayed in the sales room.
